name: YITH WooCommerce Quick View
author: YITH

sections.description:
Sometimes the halfway is better: what if you are looking to a product in a list and its image is still too small?

You have to open its product page, waiting for its loading and finally observe what you are interested into.
So why don’t use a simple way to look immediately at the product’s distinctiveness? Here it is what Quick View can offer you.

People are more attracted to what they can see clearly. And often the classic product lists are not enough to understand the real value of a product.
That’s when Quick View strikes successfully! Your clients will be free to look in a better way your products, reading also a small description with all the most important features and qualities you want to underline.
In this way, they will be more focused on what they really want and they will proceed easily to the purchase step.

Main features:

  • Add a button in product loop to open a modal window with the product summary using AJAX
  • Customize style of modal

Full documentation is available here.

Suggestions

If you have suggestions about how to improve YITH WooCommerce Quick View, you can write us so we can bundle them into YITH WooCommerce Quick View.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English
  • Italian

If you can’t find this plugin in your language and want to translate it, use the dedicated tool at Translating WordPress.
Or, if you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send it as an email attachment from our Contacts page and we will bundle into YITH WooCommerce Quick View.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate YITH WooCommerce Quick View from Plugins page.

sections.reviews:
A wonderful ingredient that I recommend using

By isabah997 on December 15, 2023

A wonderful ingredient that I recommend using

No compatible con botones de variaciones

By jhosiris on July 17, 2023

el plugins me gusta pero aun le falta compatibilidad con las cuestiones de los productos variables, actualmente tengo botones en vez de lista desplegables para mis productos variables la cual este plugins no es compatible, tuve que adquirir soporte de otro lado para solucionarlo momentaneamente, desde entonces no he podido actualizar este plugins por que al actualizarlo se borraria lo que me hicieron para que fuera compatible, asi que me quede en la Versión 1.13.0 :'( y no puedo seguir actualizando, espero quesolucionen pronto ese problema de compatibilidad para poder seguir actualizando y a futuro poder comprar la version pro

still does not support tablepress code

By Dex (dexzhou) on May 23, 2022

Years passed, and this plugin still displays [table id='xx'] instead of table content. not compatible with tablepress.

quick view and name your price

By aureliedelobelle45260 on July 12, 2021

Hello, in quick view, we cannot enter the amount of the "name your price" plugin, which causes a bug. How to solve the problem ? thank you

search engine error

By Adrian Gonzalez (adgovra) on December 27, 2020

Hi Guys, Great work on the theme, just one minor thing I have been trying to get under your attention. When searching in the results always display as follows <p>text bladiblahbla<br>. <p>blabla bla<p> this is on such a beautiful theme such a shame... I do not know if it is coding or incompatablity between som third party or even your own, which the last I doubt it, Could you get back to me on this issue please? thanks a lot KR AJ

Nice plugin

By mariodts on November 6, 2020

With excellent support. Thanks for all

Awesome!!!

By egwesetex on August 29, 2020

Highly recommended plugin. Runs smoothly.

best plugin

By 9author9 on August 14, 2020

I love using the plugin because it made website integration so seeming less stress-free.

nice plugin

By muzammilabbas on June 30, 2020

not too many features but its ok plugin

Latest update crashed wordpress

By hypofocus on June 12, 2019

I've been using this plugin for a couple of months now. But version 1.3.10 caused me to not being able to login to wordpress anymore. Luckily wordpress now has a safety mode, so i could login and disable the plugin. But i'm NOT amused by this Quick View plugin causing a fatal error....

short_description: This plugin adds the possibility to have a quick preview of the products right from product list
description:
Sometimes the halfway is better: what if you are looking to a product in a list and its image is still too small?

You have to open its product page, waiting for its loading and finally observe what you are interested into.
So why don’t use a simple way to look immediately at the product’s distinctiveness? Here it is what Quick View can offer you.

People are more attracted to what they can see clearly. And often the classic product lists are not enough to understand the real value of a product.
That’s when Quick View strikes successfully! Your clients will be free to look in a better way your products, reading also a small description with all the most important features and qualities you want to underline.
In this way, they will be more focused on what they really want and they will proceed easily to the purchase step.

Main features:

  • Add a button in product loop to open a modal window with the product summary using AJAX
  • Customize style of modal

Full documentation is available here.

Suggestions

If you have suggestions about how to improve YITH WooCommerce Quick View, you can write us so we can bundle them into YITH WooCommerce Quick View.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English
  • Italian

If you can’t find this plugin in your language and want to translate it, use the dedicated tool at Translating WordPress.
Or, if you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send it as an email attachment from our Contacts page and we will bundle into YITH WooCommerce Quick View.
